channel.title: Ok so i made it a lil farthur

item.title: Ok so i made it a lil farthur
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

this is my ring of wealth id instead of it increasing the rare drop it just gives u one how would i make like a percentage that it gives u?

public boolean rareDrops(int i) {
Client c = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].killedBy];
int ringOfWealth = 0;
if(c.wearId == 2572) {
ringOfWealth = 1+Misc.random(2);
c.sendMessage("<shad=155653>Your ring of wealth helped your drop rate by “+ringOfWealth+” ");
c.getItems().addItem(c.getPA().ITEM_RARE(), 1);
}
return false;
}

Read full topic
item.source: Ok so i made it a lil farthur
